quote: He'd possessed all the key elements of a school shooter: hormones, misery, ammunition. People wondered how something like Columbine could happen. Jude wondered why it didn't happen more often.
quote_letters: HED POSSESSED ALL THE KEY ELEMENTS OF A SCHOOL SHOOTER HORMONES MISERY AMMUNITION PEOPLE WONDERED HOW SOMETHING LIKE COLUMBINE COULD HAPPEN JUDE WONDERED WHY IT DIDNT HAPPEN MORE OFTEN
